`UC_II_WOMEN_TRAVELWITH_DEPENDENT_BarGraph = bar(UC_II_WOMEN_TRAVELWITH_DEPENDENT_Result[1,:], UC_II_WOMEN_TRAVELWITH_DEPENDENT_Result[2,:],legend = false, xlabel = "Nodes", ylabel = "Weight of Shortest Path", title = "UC_II_WOMEN_TRAVELWITH_DEPENDENT")`

I didn't the reason behind it.

text: Is there another plotting package in your namespace? I recall getting errors like this when PyPlot was also loaded, because IIRC both Plots and PyPlot export a different `savefig`, so they collide.
